game_info_rename: Rename any object by hold clicking on it, excluding the game name and description.
game_info_add_question: Add questions by clicking the 'Add question' button.
game_info_add_image: Add images to the questions by clicking the 'Upload image' button.
game_info_question_settings: Change the settings of the questions by clicking the 'Settings' button.
game_info_game_settings: Change the settings of the game by clicking the 'Game settings' button. Game settings modal will be automatically opened after you close this modal.
game_info_done: After you are done, save the game by clicking the 'Save game' button.
question: Question
developers: Boris Savushkin, Kalle Kahri, Mike Luong, Thomas Zeilstra
